text: Nubareke bamwe bayigize yuko ari urukino nukutitaho kw’idini ryabo bakaba barahenzwe n’ubuzima bw’Isi, rero n’ubibutse yuko ntihaze hashike aho umutima w’umuntu uzohonywa kubera ivyo wagize, kuko ntawuzo kingira uwo mutima canke uwuzo wusabira uwariwe wese imbere y’Imana, naho uwo mutima wotanga ingwati y’ibintu bimeze gute ntuzo kwemererwa, abo nibo bantu bahonejwe kubera ivyo bakoze, kandi nibo bazoronswa ibinyobwa vy’amazi y’amarike hamwe n’ibihano bibabaza cane kubera ubuhakanyi bwabo
